review: Came here for a night stay with family over the weekend. Hotel rooms were good and clean. Shall be my first preference if I'm on a budget. Also the hotel is centrally located and markets are nearby. Could not try their food options as we had short of time
name: Sahil

review: I visited this property with my family and I had a great time. The hotel is comfortable and located close to the local market. The food served is very good  and the staff is extremely polite. The rooms are pretty and well ventilated and I shall certainly visit again
name: Vrindaa Malik

review: Stopped for break journey on our way to Nainital. Had a strong recommendation from a close friend already and Amber did not disappoint.  Courteous staff, modern & plush luxurious rooms which looked so fresh as if renovated yesterday.  The restaurant was cosy and food out of the world.   A must recommend for a break journey night stay if you are going from Delhi to Nainital. Start at 1600 hours, break journey at Rudrapur and leave all rejuvenated after a sumptuous breakfast the next morning to reach Nainital. Cheers
name: ALM

review: Excellent stay on our way to Nainital. This hotel is more than 20 years old. Don’t go on the looks at the outside. Once you go inside it is all newly renovated. Great food. Comfortable stay. Hospitable staff. They also have a Tanishq jewellery showroom on the ground floor and is at the prime location of Rudrapur.
name: Beenu Malik

review: I had visited Rudrapur last month for some official purpose and stayed at hotel amber and I must say that my stay was extremely comfortable. The hotel is centrally loacated and has an amazing restaurant which services a variety of cuisine. Their butter chicken is simply delicious, the perfect blend of sweet and spice. The staff is extremely helpful and courteous. The rooms are well built and bathrooms are very neat and clean. I believe it’s totally a value for money experience and I shall definitely make my booking for this place every time I visit Rudrapur.
name: Deepanshee

review: Located in the centre of main market, the place is all pleasant and clean. The staff was generous as well as helpful not only during our stay but also in assisting us with our way ahead to Nainital. Must try - Butter Chicken
name: Anurag N

review: The hotel was good. Rooms were neat and clean. Stayed in executive room with complementary breakfast. Breakfast was also good. Got an online deal with flash sale. Highly recommended if you stay in Rudrapur.
name: Sushma Arora

review: After a long journey, we checked in this hotel.. the room was superb. The bed was super comfortable and the staff was prompt whenever we needed any help at any hour. The food was beyond the expectation. Whatever we ordered was delicious. Thanks to the staff for making our stay so pleasant. Looking forward to stay again at Amber!
name: Nitika_84

review: This was probably tge first hotel i stayed at when i first went to rudrapur a good decade back. Th hotel continues to be as good even today. Bang on the main road the rooms face the road and therefore the hustle and bustle of the city ensures you do not have a single dull moment when you stay here. Room and food quality are good.
name: Sureka S

review: This is the best hotel. I just love this hotel. The facilities, and the service, all are good here. I would recommend this Hotel to everyone visiting here. This is the best hotel i had ever visited. I would like to visit again
name: Anurag Das

review: Rooms were not neat and clean.staff was not supportive and breakfast was ok ok. Rooms view was very bad ,even smell was there no ventilation.even after explaining them the whole issue still they were not able to solve that.
name: Sarvesh P

review: I used to go to this hotel long time ago it is as good as any 5 star hotel the rooms are clean the service is good and restaurant is clean and tidy the service is fast and food is mid range and good.Love it
name: Dipanshu R

review: We went there to stay for couple of days and found the staff is hospitable, helpful and very courteous and provides you a pleasant stay.We went there to stay for couple of days and found the staff is hospitable, helpful and very courteous and provides you a pleasant stay. I always stay in this hotel during my trip. The ambiance is also quite nice and pleasant.
name: PRAMOD B

review: When I go to rudrapur then I always select this hotel to stay there as this is very near to Bus stand and you can easily catch auto to go SIDCUL industrial area. I like the test of coffee very much od this hotel with alloo pratha in the breakfast. Totaly Paisa basul ..
name: balraj12raja

review: Hotel Amber is situated in the middle of the busy Rudrapur Market and in that sense there is never a dull moment in case you stay in the room for long. I say this because i had gone on company work and ocassionally if i came back early i could afford the luxury of going to the busy market in no time.Being right in the middle of the market helps because you get a variety of choices for eating out-be it lunch,dinner or timepass snacking.Overall a good hotel for its location.
name: Alok S

review: I happened to stay at hotel amber on a business visit to rudrapur. The hotel is at a very good location, has easy access to market etc., parking space is available and was highly recommended to me by the locals and office colleagues and I was not disappointed. I was welcomed by the staff and guided to my room which was booked for me by a colleague. The rooms were very spacious and washrooms were quite hygenic. Since it was lunchtime and I was starving, I immediately decided to order for lunch. The food was very very good. I would highly recommend the butter chicken and paneer lababdaar to anyone visiting the hotel. At dinner time, I also ordered the chicken Kali Mirch and was mighty pleased with my decision. The food was truly the highlight for me. I don't know if it was the
name: mayanknayyar

review: Hotel Amber is located in a prime location of Rudrapur. Hotel is not so lavish/modern but it offers good rooms at decent price. Manager and higher management is good and very helpful, but serving staff is not so qualified for hospitality. Staff were recruited among local workers with less knowledge of good hospitality, but they serve there purpose. Food quality was average, only few Indian dishes were good , better to have dinner outside. safety and security is there,no need to worry.  They offer discounts as well on Room Tariffs as well.  Over all experience is OK
name: Ashutosh M

review: Good ambience, Good service, Excellent hospitality, refreshing environment, just a bit admin problem with the people they keep (they need to guide their staff a bit more)..... Overall good experience during one night stay at the hotel.
name: Sumit S
